overview.title: MIMODZI Overview
overview.content: Welcome to Mimodzi, your innovative farming application, the ultimate digital partner for modern farmers. Harness the power of Artificial Intelligence (AI) for precision farming at your fingertips.

appOffers.title: AI-Driven Crop Recommendations
appOffers.description: Based on the soil health, weather conditions, and other data, the AI can recommend the best suitable crops to grow for optimal yield.

appOffers.title: Microfinance Marketplace
appOffers.description: This is a platform where users can apply for agricultural loans. The app can have a feature to fill a form for loan application. The AI could suggest the best loan options available based on the farmer's financial situation, farming needs, and potential return on investment.

appOffers.title: Microfinance Marketplace

process_to_microfinance.item1: First download the MIMODZI app through Google Store and Apple Store.
process_to_microfinance.item2: MIMODZI is a platform where you can easily apply for agriculture loans.
process_to_microfinance.item3: Fill the application form and apply for the loan
process_to_microfinance.item4: AI could suggest the best loan options available based on the farmer's financial situation,

step.title: Apply For Loan
step.description: Here you can click on Apply for Loan and the next screen open in which you will fill the form

step.title: Fill the Loan Application Form
step.description: In this stage You will Provide you Personal information and you crop Information

step.title: AI Based Loan Suggestion
step.description: Here You can see the AI Based Loan Suggestion according to your best feasibility

step.title: Select Plan
step.description: In this Stage you can  Select the Loan Plan which is Suitable for you.

step.title: Wait For Approval
step.description: After that your application submit to our company and the company will contact you soon

content.title: The User Authentication in MIMODZI
content.description: Our User Authentication is a crucial feature that ensures secure access to the app. It allows users to create an account, log in, and manage their personal information securely. By implementing authentication mechanisms such as username/password combinations, biometric authentication, or two-factor authentication, the app ensures that only authorized users can access the app's functionalities

privacy.title: Privacy and Policy
privacy.descriptionInitial: At MiModzi Farming, we are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our website users. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect personal information. By using our website, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

itemList.1: Sharing of Personal Information: We do not sell, trade, or rent personal information to third parties. However, we may share personal information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting business activities, or servicing users, subject to confidentiality agreements.
itemList.2: Data Security: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of personal information. However, no data transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect personal information, we cannot guarantee absolute security.
itemList.3: Cookies and Tracking Technologies: Our website may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance user experience, personalize content, and analyze website usage. Users can control cookie preferences through their browser settings. However, disabling cookies may limit the functionality and user experience of our website.
itemList.4: Links to Third-Party Websites: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those websites. We encourage users to review the privacy policies of any linked websites they visit.
itemList.5: Children's Privacy: Our website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that personal information of a child has been provided without parental consent, we will take steps to remove such information from our records.
itemList.6: Changes to the Privacy Policy: We reserve the right to modify or update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the revised Privacy Policy on our website. We encourage users to review this policy periodically for any updates.

itemsList.1: Use of the Website: Use the Crop Website for agricultural purposes only and in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.
itemsList.2: User Accounts: Create an account using accurate and current information. Maintain the confidentiality of your account credentials and notify us immediately of any unauthorized access or use.
itemsList.3: Crop Information: The information provided on the Crop Website is for general informational purposes only. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or suitability of the information for your specific needs. Use the information at your own risk.
itemsList.4: Crop Recommendations: Any crop recommendations or advice provided on the Crop Website are based on general principles and should not replace professional agronomic expertise. Use your discretion and consult local agricultural experts for site-specific recommendations.
itemsList.5: Crop Inputs and Products: Any mention or recommendation of crop inputs, products, or suppliers on the Crop Website does not constitute an endorsement or guarantee of their quality, efficacy, or
